text: Dalhatu Sarki Tafida (born 24 November 1940) was a Minister of Health during the administration of Alhaji Shehu Shagari. He was the Senator of the Kaduna North constituency of Kaduna State.http://psephos.adam- carr.net/countries/n/nigeria/nigerialeg2.txt == Education == Tafida holds a bachelor's degree in medicine and a bachelor's of surgery from the University of Lagos. He also received a Postgraduate Diploma in Public Health from the University of Liverpool, United Kingdom. ==References== Category:1940 births Category:Living people Category:People from Kaduna State Category:Nigerian physicians
title: Dalhatu Tafida
